languages.text: "Я и без дара провидения с таким же ощущением остался. В общем-то, нетрудно догадаться, что Инквизиция не все карты на стол выложила".
"I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."
languages.original_text: "Я и без дара провидения с таким же ощущением остался. В общем-то, нетрудно догадаться, что Инквизиция не все карты на стол выложила".

traits.locale_text: "I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “虽然我没有天生的异能，但我也有同样的感觉。毕竟，审判庭不太可能把所有的底牌都摊在桌上。”
languages.original_text: "I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."

traits.locale_text: “虽然我没有天生的异能，但我也有同样的感觉。毕竟，审判庭不太可能把所有的底牌都摊在桌上。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Pas besoin d'être devin pour avoir ce genre d'impression. L'Inquisition n'est pas réputée pour abattre toutes ses cartes en même temps. »
languages.original_text: "I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."

traits.locale_text: « Pas besoin d'être devin pour avoir ce genre d'impression. L'Inquisition n'est pas réputée pour abattre toutes ses cartes en même temps. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No hace falta el don de la providencia para pensar eso mismo. A fin de cuentas, la Inquisición nunca ha sido propensa a poner todas las cartas sobre la mesa».
languages.original_text: "I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."

traits.locale_text: «No hace falta el don de la providencia para pensar eso mismo. A fin de cuentas, la Inquisición nunca ha sido propensa a poner todas las cartas sobre la mesa».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「神の恩寵さえなく、同じ気持ちだけが私にも残っています。結局、異端審問庁が手の内をすべて明かすなど全く期待できないということです」
languages.original_text: "I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."

traits.locale_text: 「神の恩寵さえなく、同じ気持ちだけが私にも残っています。結局、異端審問庁が手の内をすべて明かすなど全く期待できないということです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte dasselbe Gefühl, selbst ohne die Gabe der Vorsehung. Schließlich ist es unwahrscheinlich, dass die Inquisition alle ihre Karten auf den Tisch gelegt hat."
languages.original_text: "I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte dasselbe Gefühl, selbst ohne die Gabe der Vorsehung. Schließlich ist es unwahrscheinlich, dass die Inquisition alle ihre Karten auf den Tisch gelegt hat."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."

languages.text: "Sezgi yeteneğine nail olmamakla birlikte ben de öyle hissettim. Sonuçta Engizisyon'un elindeki tüm kozları oynamış olması ihtimali oldukça düşük."
languages.original_text: "I was left with the same feeling even without the gift of providence. After all, it is quite unlikely that the Inquisition laid all its cards on the table."

traits.locale_text: "O sezgi yeteneğine sahip değilim ama ben de öyle hissettim. Sonuçta Engizisyon'un elindeki tüm kozları oynamış olması ihtimali oldukça düşük."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
